version_description:
[v2.32 Update Details]
- 3 Ethereal+ Pets Added
- Daily Dungeon Reward Added
- 3 Elite Stage Areas Added
- New World Boss / Season Changes
- Stamina Recovery Method Changed

[v2.32 Update Details]
- 3 Ethereal+ Pets Added
- Daily Dungeon Reward Added
- 3 Elite Stage Areas Added
- New World Boss / Season Changes
- Stamina Recovery Method Changed

[v2.33 Update Details]
- 3 Ethereal+ Pets Added (PvP)
- Character Balance Adjustment
- Melee Round Reward Added
- Character Deletion Feature Improved

[v2.33 Update Details]
- 3 Ethereal+ Pets Added (PvP)

[v2.34 Update Details]

[v2.34 Update Details]
- Tower of Tribulation Feature Improved
- Equipment Set Effect Added
- Hero Craft Feature Added
- MAX Avatar Possession Effect Increased

[v2.35 Update Details]
- New Class Added: Noblia
- Event Attendance Log Added
- Login Time Reward System Added
- Shop UI Improved
- Apple Watch Sync Feature Added

[v2.36 Update Details]
- Noblia's Awakened Skills Added
- Gem Crafting System
- Ethereal+ Equipment Max Level Increased (Level 20)
- Ethereal+ Enhance Items Added
- Attendance Event Change
- Other Functional Updates

[v2.37 Update Summary]
- Official Launch of Guild Battle
- 3 New Packages Added
- Stage Mode Mao's Support Added to Quick Buy
- Monster Wave SKIP Tickets Added to Quick Buy
- Event Attendance Changes
- Additional User Convenience Features Added

[v2.37 Update Summary]
- Official Launch of Guild Battle
- 3 New Packages Added
- Stage Mode Mao's Support Added to Quick Buy
- Monster Wave SKIP Tickets Added to Quick Buy
- Event Attendance Changes
- Additional User Convenience Features Added

[v2.38 Update Details]
- Newly added"Super Awakening" - Berserker, Demon Blade, and Burst Breaker
- New currency: K Coins
- Added rewards for Stage Auto Repeat
- Gem Craft Effect Increased
- Double Karats (Once a month)
- Super Sale Package changes
- Attendance Event changes

[v2.39 Update Contents]
- Super Awakening Part 2 Added - Cat Acrobat, Crimson Assassin, Dark Valkyrie, Blood Demon
- Pet Possession Effects System Added
- Changes made to allow for simultaneous purchase of 2 types of monthly products
- Partial Package Contents Changes (Upgrades)
- Super Sale Package Contents Changes
- Attendance Event Changes
- UI Improvements

[v2.40 Update Contents]
- New Super Awakening System Added (3rd) - Shadow Mage, Ice Warlock, Eclair, Noblia
- Chaos Stages Added
- Pet Possession Effect List Added
- New User Attendance Added
- Super Sale Package Content Changes
- Event Attendance Changes

[v2.40 Update Contents]
- New Super Awakening System Added (3rd) - Shadow Mage, Ice Warlock, Eclair, Noblia
- Chaos Stages Added
- Pet Possession Effect List Added
- New User Attendance Added
- Super Sale Package Content Changes
- Event Attendance Changes

[v2.41更新明细]
-新增2种全新超级、真·超级等阶宠物
-特价优惠礼包结构调整
-活动签到薄结构调整

[v2.42 Updates]
- New character Mystic Wolf Guardian added
- Stage Auto Progress Mode added
- Super Awakened characters rebalanced
- Ethereal Combine material count and cost changed
- Ethereal+ equipment must now be crafted from material of +0 and above
- Stamina bonus packages added

[v2.45 Update Details]
- Labyrinth Mode
- Pet Relic System
- Content Changes to Attendance Event and Super Sale Package

[v2.43 Update Details]
- Mystic Wolf Guardian Awakening & Super Awakening Update
- Added Awakening/Super Awakening Master Skills
- Super Awakening Damage Balancing (Cat Acrobat, Ice Warlock, Dark Valkyrie)
- Increased Avatar Possession Effects to 40 Pieces
- Event Attendance Changes
- Super Sale Package Changes

[v2.44 Updates]
- Meteorite Auto Crafting Added
- Shop UI Changes
- Awakening Mission Difficulty Lowered
- Gem Crafting Improved
- Gem Enhance Success Rate Increased
- Black Market Item Changes
- VIP MAX for Stamina, Sapphires, Brawler's Badges, and Melee Badges Increased
- Event Attendance and Super Sale Package Changes

[v2.45 Update Details]
- Labyrinth Mode
- Pet Relic System
- Content Changes to Attendance Event and Super Sale Package

[v2.45 Update Details]
- Labyrinth Mode - Pet Relic System - Content Changes to Attendance Event and Super Sale Package

[v2.46 Updates]
- New character: Monk
- Added Repeat feature for Daily Dungeons
- Increased Daily Play Limit of Daily Dungeons to 20
- Added Meteorite Inventory Expansion System
- Revamped Event Login Calendar and Super Sale Packages

[v2.47 Updates]
- Monk Super Awakening Added
- Monk Awakened Skills and Super Awakened Skills Added

[v2.48 Update Details]
- Ethereal+ Meteorites added
- Auto Repeat now available for Tower of Tribulations
- Level cap raised for Awakened and Super Awakened Master Skills

[v2.49 Update Details]
- Hell Mode added to Chaos Stage
- Auto Repeat now available for Elite Stages
- More Elite Chest Slots
- You can now sell pets

[v2.50 Updates]
- Added Auto Repeat to Arena
- Added Auto Repeat to Melee
- Added Reset button for Master skills
- Changed rules for obtaining Meteorites

[v3.00 Updates]
- New Character! Halo Mage
- Set Effects for Avatars Added

[v3.8 Update Notes]
- Strike Archer Super Awakening & Active Skill Awakening
- Expanded Character Achievement to 20 Ranks
- Added Auto Repeat Feature to World Boss

[v3.9 Update Details]
- Tower of Tribulation extended to 65F & more seasons added
- Enhance cost for Ethereal+ pets reduced
- Meteorite options can now be changed

[v3.7 Update details]
- New Class: Strike Archer
- EXP Potion, VIP Potion added

- Halo Mage Super Awakening
